page.title: 15Peterlee Carnival.
page.content: The{Peterlee Carnival}comes to Helford Road every September. When we go to the Carnival we have lots of fun. In the Peterlee Carnival the{Peterlee {Half Marathon}takes place. The Carnival itself takes place on the cricket pitch. The three wheeler motorbikes are 50p a ride. The slot machines are 2p or 1p a go. Sometimes you can win lots of money. At the Carnival there are also computers at 5p a go. "The Eggs" is a big wheel which goes very fast. The Army also has a display at the carnival. In the big tents you can buy almost anything. The game with floating plastic ducks is called "Hook The Duck". It is a game where you catch a duck with a hook. At the end you can win a prize if you are lucky!
